articles.title: Patriots vs. Dolphins live updates: Will New England drop to 0-2?
articles.description:
The Patriots have lost five straight games in Miami.

The post Patriots vs. Dolphins live updates: Will New England drop to 0-2? appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Patriots face Dolphins in Miami, aiming to avoid an 0-2 start this season.
New England has lost five consecutive games in Miami, impacting team morale.
Local fans express concern over team's performance and potential playoff implications.

articles.title: Years in the making, Quincy’s new MBTA parking garage opens Monday
articles.description:
The parking garage will replace the original surface-level parking lot at the station after six years of construction, according to the MBTA.

The post Years in the making, Quincy’s new MBTA parking garage opens Monday appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Quincy's new MBTA parking garage opens on Monday, replacing the old surface lot.
The project took six years to complete, enhancing commuter access.
Local residents will benefit from increased parking capacity at the station.

articles.title: N.H. leads 25 states in seeking Supreme Court review of ‘unconstitutional’ Mass. gun law
articles.description:
The effort calls into question whether or not Massachusetts’ firearm regulations for out-of-state visitors are unconstitutional.

The post N.H. leads 25 states in seeking Supreme Court review of ‘unconstitutional’ Mass. gun law appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: New Hampshire leads 25 states in challenging Massachusetts' gun regulations for out-of-state visitors.
The Supreme Court review could affect Massachusetts' firearm laws established in 2020.
Potential ruling may impact local gun ownership rights and regulations for Boston residents.

articles.title: What to know about the aftermath of Charlie Kirk’s assassination
articles.description:
Authorities are still trying to learn more about what motivated the fatal shooting of Charlie Kirk at a college in Utah.

The post What to know about the aftermath of Charlie Kirk’s assassination appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Charlie Kirk was fatally shot at a college in Utah on September 14, 2025.
Authorities are investigating the motive behind the assassination, impacting national political discourse.
Boston residents may see increased security measures at local events following the incident.
